name: Raabit Gate
description: The bark of the Great Tree deforms outward, providing a place to stop and catch your breath. Below the whole island is visible, as well as another in the far distance. Above, there are two masked beings guarding what appears to be a passageway into the Great Tree.

name: Nmekufu Village
description: The passage opens up to a large cavity inside the tree. The walls glow with a warm, magical light. A few masked villagers sit around a central plaza. The tallest of them is wearing a much larger, darker mask. A carved staircase on the far side of the village leads up to a hole in the ceiling.
conversionActions: Spin Baobhan Hair:Baobhan Thread:Baobhan Hair:You begin spinning the hair into thread.
Spin Ruwohane Hair:Ruwohane Thread:Ruwohane Hair:You begin spinning the hair into thread.

name: Lower Village
description: The lower part of the village is home to a few expertly crafted looms. The magic glow of the walls makes it easy to see what you are doing. A strange man stands in the corner, not dressed like the people of the village.
conversionActions: Weave Baobhan Fabric:Baobhan Fabric:Baobhan Thread:You begin weaving the thread into fabric.
Weave Ruwohane Fabric:Ruwohane Fabric:Ruwohane Thread:You begin weaving the thread into fabric.

name: Upper Branches
description: You emerge from the stairs to an open view of the world below. Branches and leaves block all the light from above. A dozen Nmekufians are gathering nuts from the outer branches.

name: Riimata Pool
description: The water here doesn't seem to have a source, but when one draws from it, it bubbles and returns to full. A few Nmekufians are filling large jugs to bring back down to the village.
